rows.label: qev013202_MSG0002
rows.name:
AAH! AAAAAUGH! The b-black Skell!
Y-you're with the black Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_JNK0010
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev013202_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Bates that you are a friend.

rows.label: qev013202_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev013202_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask about the black Skell.

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh? Is that you, [ST:playername ]...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0005
rows.name: Did Corwin send you to help me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0006
rows.name: The black Skell is... No, that thing's no Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's a mechanical horror! A demon!
Nothing of this world can move like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0008
rows.name:
AAAAAH! IT'S COMING! Coming for us all!
We've got to—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0009
rows.name:
W-wait a second... *huff* *puff*
Is that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0010
rows.name:
Is that you, [ST:playername ]?
Are you here to rescue me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, thank heavens! The black Skell's minions
are all over this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even if I could get my legs to stop shaking,
I'd never make it through without a Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0013
rows.name:
S-sorry, but...I don't think I can fight.
Just seeing them makes me remember...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0014
rows.name:
P-please, you've got to kill that thing's minions.
Clear the area of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0015
rows.name:
If you can do that for me, I should be able
to get back to New LA. Please, I just...
I just want to be somewhere safe again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0016
rows.name: I didn't want you to see me like this. But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm just scared, dammit! Every time I close my eyes,
I see that black monster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0018
rows.name: Please. I'm begging you... Kill that thing's minions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0019
rows.name: Are...are they gone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_JNK0030
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: qev013202_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Bates that the area is secure.

rows.label: qev013202_JNK0040
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev013202_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Bates to stay alert because of the black Skell.

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thank you. I feel calmer already. You've got
a way of putting people at ease, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0021
rows.name: Anyway...I should be all right to go home now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0022
rows.name:
And the sooner the better. I don't want to
stick around here another second![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0023
rows.name: WHAT?! Where is it?! Is it—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Oh, so it's gone now? Thank goodness.
But yeah, you're right. I can't relax yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0025
rows.name:
We've got to get home while we can.
If that thing comes back, we're all dead men![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0026
rows.name:
All right, [ST:playername ]. I better go.
I owe you my life, though. Thank you. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0027
rows.name:
Heh... If the boss saw me like this,
I'd get more than just an earful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0028
rows.name:
The boss socked me a pretty good one. Said I was
a coward for flinching at something like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0029
rows.name:
It helped clear my head a bit, but I still catch myself
shaking whenever I remember what I saw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013202_MSG0030
rows.name:
I've got to get over this. Get back on the front lines,
and help Corwin and the rest of my team carve us
out a safe future here on Mira![ST:wait ]
